I'm a high school teacher charged with starting the school's first philosophy course. I've been given a lot of room to decide the structure of the course. As a book, I decided to go with The Philosophical Journey by Lawhead (a recommendation I got from a search here, thanks). I've got a good rough outline and syllabus, but I'm having trouble coming up with ideas for projects. What I mean by projects is an assignment that can be used for culminating assessment. For example, I read about people roleplaying particular philosophers and then creating a dialogue around certain questions or themes. I'd like to give that, or something similar, a try.
